answers.author: Brandi Allen
answers.text:
Hi Thomas, I'm not sure about ICMA, but the Alliance for Innovation has an awards program for innovations in local government eligible for member jurisdictions. We are currently accpeting applications. Full info and how to apply can be found at http://transformgov.org/en/about/innovation_awards

author: Thomas Otzelberger
text: Does ICMA offer any type type of awards for innovation in technology that local governments have implemented? Are there other organizations that you know of that offer awards of that type? I am already aware of Public Technology Institute and the Alliance for Innovation. Thanks for any assistance you might render.
title: Technology Innovation Awards
